emoblique.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 
00002 ! ==================================================================
00003 !
00004 !              EMOBLIQ
00005 !
00006 !  Compute relativistic fields for oblique-incidence standing wave field
00007 !       s-light
00008 !
00009 ! ==================================================================
00010 
00011 subroutine emobliq(t,tpulse,sigma_in,vosc,omega,theta,rho_upper,x,y,z,epon_x,epon_y,epon_z,phipon,Ez,Bx,By)
00012 
00013   implicit none
00014   real, intent(in) :: t ! time
00015   real, intent(in) :: tpulse ! pulse duration/rise time
00016   real, intent(in) :: vosc ! quiver strength
00017   real, intent(in) :: sigma_in ! pulse width (1/e)
00018   real, intent(in) :: omega ! laser frequency
00019   real, intent(in) :: theta ! angle of incidence
00020 
00021   real, intent(in) :: x,y,z ! position to evaluate force; x is distance into target from surface (x_c)
00022   real, intent(in) :: rho_upper
00023   real, intent(out) :: phipon, epon_x, epon_y, epon_z ! pond. potential and fields
00024   real, intent(out) :: Ez, By, Bx  ! laser fields
00025 
00026   real :: xf, yf, zf, Tpon, Rpon, Xpon, Ypon, Zpon, intensity, gamma, sigma, atten, alpha, eps, dXpon
00027   real :: r, pi=3.141592654, phi_s, chi_s, a02, sigma0
00028   real :: rho0_up, wp_r, ls_r, gamma_s, f2d
00029   real :: kx, ky, tphase, k0, thetar
00030 
00031   ! phase factors (normalised to nominal wp)
00032   thetar=pi*theta/180.
00033   k0 = omega
00034   kx = k0*cos(thetar)
00035   ky = k0*sin(thetar)
00036   tphase = omega*t - ky*y  ! time phase
00037 
00038   Tpon = sin(tphase)**2
00039 
00040   ! intensity envelope
00041   a02 = vosc**2
00042   if (t <= 2*tpulse) then 
00043 !    intensity = a02*max(0.,sin(pi*t/2./tpulse)**2) 
00044      intensity = a02
00045   else
00046     intensity = 0.
00047   endif
00048 
00049   rho0_up = rho_upper*omega**2   ! Effective density of shelf above xc normalised to rho0
00050 
00051   if (sigma_in <0) then
00052      sigma0=-sigma_in
00053      f2d = 0.  ! switch off 2d field components
00054   else
00055      sigma0=sigma_in
00056      f2d=1.
00057   endif
00058 
00059 
00060 !  Standing wave in vacuum; evanescent in overdense plasma
00061 !  Use standard solution of Helmholtz equation for step profile
00062 
00063   gamma_s = sqrt(1.+4*intensity/rho_upper)  ! gamma factor for EM solution at x=xc
00064   wp_r = sqrt(rho0_up/gamma_s)  ! effective plasma frequency of upper shelf
00065 !  wp_r=1.
00066   ls_r = 1./wp_r   ! rel. skin depth
00067 
00068   phi_s = atan(-kx*ls_r) ! Interface phase factor given by tan(phi) = -kx * l_r
00069   chi_s = kx*x + phi_s  ! Vacuum phase (s-pol) 
00070 
00071   if (x.le.0) then
00072      xf = omega*sin(2*chi_s)
00073      Xpon = sin(chi_s)    ! laser phase
00074      dXpon = kx*cos(chi_s) ! derivative
00075      sigma = sigma0*sqrt(1.+abs(x)**2/10./sigma0**2) ! take Rayleigh length 4*sigma0
00076      eps = 1.  ! refractive index
00077   else
00078      xf = -2/ls_r*sin(phi_s)**2*exp(-2*x/ls_r)
00079      Xpon = sin(phi_s)*exp(-x/ls_r)    ! laser phase inside
00080      dXpon = -sin(phi_s)/ls_r*exp(-x/ls_r) ! derivative
00081      sigma = sigma0  ! Don't expand spot inside target
00082      eps = 1.-(wp_r/omega)**2  ! refractive index inside target
00083   endif
00084 
00085   r = sqrt(y**2+z**2)
00086 
00087   alpha = pi*r/4./sigma  ! sigma is HWHM of sin^2 laser spot 
00088 !  Rpon = exp((-yd**2-zd**2)/sigma**2)  ! Gaussian
00089 
00090   if (r < 2*sigma .and. r/= 0.) then
00091      yf = -pi/4./sigma*y/r*sin(2*alpha)
00092      zf = -pi/4./sigma*z/r*sin(2*alpha)
00093      Rpon = cos(alpha)**2
00094   else if (r >= 2*sigma) then
00095      yf = 0.
00096      zf = 0.
00097      Rpon = 0.
00098   else
00099      Rpon = cos(alpha)**2
00100      yf = 0.
00101      zf = 0.
00102   endif
00103 
00104 
00105 
00106   atten = sigma0**2/sigma**2
00107   phipon = 4*Xpon**2*Rpon*atten*intensity*Tpon  ! intensity, including attenuation factor
00108 
00109   gamma = sqrt(1.+abs(phipon*Tpon))  ! relativistic phi_pond
00110 
00111   Ez = 2*vosc*cos(tphase)*Xpon*sqrt(Rpon*atten)
00112   Bx = 2*ky*vosc/omega*cos(tphase)*Xpon*sqrt(Rpon*atten)
00113   By = 2*vosc/omega*sin(tphase)*dXpon*sqrt(Rpon*atten)
00114 
00115   Epon_x = 2*intensity*Tpon*Rpon/gamma*xf*atten
00116   Epon_y = f2d*2*intensity*Tpon*Xpon**2/gamma*yf*atten
00117   Epon_z = f2d*2*intensity*Tpon*Xpon**2/gamma*zf*atten
00118 !  Epon_z = 0.   
00119 
00120 end subroutine emobliq
00121
